name: Rune Circlet [1]
description: Crown made according to the dress style of Rune Knight with rune magic power.
effect: Str ＋2,When Strength reaches 120, Atk ＋10, Refine Atk ＋10

description: Crown made according to the dress style of Rune Knight with rune magic power.

description: A hair ring embroidered with "Louen" in gold silk.

name: Rune Knight Badge
description: Rune Knight Badge.

name: Rune Shoes
description: One of the first modern boots made by wizards who studied ancient runes. The boost are inlaid with magic runes.

name: Rune Shoes [1]
description: One of the first modern boots made by wizards who studied ancient runes. The boost are inlaid with magic runes.

name: Runestone Hagalas
description: Special Runestone made by Rune Knight. Use it to reduces the Atk and M.Atk of the target you hit by 10% for 5s. Runestone lasts 3m

name: Runestone Isia
description: Special Runestone made by Rune Knight. Use it to increase the effect of Hp recovery items and healing received by 30% for 3 minutes

name: Runestone Nosiege
description: Special Runestone made by Rune Knight. Use it to remove all negative effects and become immune to them for 5s. Has a cooldown of 30s

name: Runestone Turisus
description: Special Runestone made by Rune Knight. Use it to gain 10 STR, 20% Crit.Dmg for 3m

name: Runestone Urj
description: Special Runestone made by Rune Knight. Use it to restore 100 SP every 5s for 8m

name: Runestone Verkana
description: Special Runestone made by Rune Knight. Use it to gain 200 Def, 50 MDef for 3m

name: Runner Bracer
description: A light bracer that allows hands to move freely, Wearer can feel the breath of the wind.

name: Runner Bracer[1]
description: A light bracer that allows hands to move freely, Wearer can feel the breath of the wind.

name: Rye - Sign of Spring Azure

name: Sabbath [1]
description: The axe that can make the restless souls in the hell rest in peace.
